Translations.Text: Ani tyancya cohikade ti alpavayina balake hindata-phirata asatila. Je nehami (balaka) rahanare aheta. Jevha tumhi tyanna pahala tara kalpana karala ki te (janu) vikhuralele (as'sala) moti aheta
Ani tumhi tithe, jikade pahala tikade purna isadenagya ani mahana rajyasatta disuna ye'ila
Tyancya (sarira) vara hirave maulyavana ani jada resami vastre asatila. Ani tyanna candicya kankanaca dagina ghatala ja'ila ani tyanna tyanca palanakarta svaccha sud'dha (paka) madya pajela
(Pharmavile ja'ila) ha ahe tumacya karmanca mobadala ani tumacya prayatnanci prasansa keli geli
Nihsansaya, amhi tumacyavara kura'ana halu halu (kramakramane) avatarita kele
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya adesavara atala raha, ani tyancyapaiki konatyahi aparadhyace kinva krtaghnace mhanane man'ya karu naka
Ani sakala sandhyakala apalya palanakartyace namahsmarana kara
Ani ratricya veli tyacya samora sajade kara ani ratricya dirgha bhagaparyarnta tyace pavitryasaha gunagana kara
Nihsansaya, he loka lavakara prapta honarya jagaci iccha dharatata, ani apalya mage eka mothya bharadasta divasala soduna detata
Amhi tyanna nirmana kele ani amhica tyance joda (sandhe) majabuta kele ani amhi vatela tevha tyancya badalyata tyancyasarakhe dusaryanna badaluna anu
Nihsansaya, ha tara eka upadesa ahe. Tevha jo icchila tyane apalya palanakartyaca marga prapta karava
Ani tumhi iccha na karala parantu he ki allahaca icchila. Nihsansaya, allaha jananara ani hikamata balaganara ahe
Jyala icchila, apalya krpeta samila karuna ghe'ila ani aparadhi (atyacarim) karita tyane duhkhadayaka azaba tayara karuna thevala ahe
Manamohaka, satata calanarya manda haveci sapatha
Maga jorata (vegane) vahu laganarinci sapatha
Ani (dhaganna) pasaravinarinci sapatha
Maga satya - asatyala vegavegale karanare
Ani vahayi (prakasana) ananarya pharistyanci sapatha
Ji (vahayi) aropace khandana karanyasathi kinva saceta karanyasathi asate
Nihsansaya, jya gostica tumacyasi vayada kela jata ahe ti agadi niscitapane ghaduna yenara ahe
Tara jevha tare nisteja kele jatila
Ani akasaca vidhvansa kela ja'ila
Ani jevha parvata tukade tukade karuna udavile jatila
Ani jevha paigambaranna nirdharita velevara anale ja'ila
Konatya divasakarita (tyanna) thambavile gele ahe
Nirnayacya divasakarita
Ani tumhala kaya mahita ki nirnayaca divasa kaya ahe
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi duhsthiti (vinasa) ahe
Kaya amhi purvi ho'una gelelya lokanna nasta nahi kele
Maga amhi tyancya pathopatha nantaracya lokanna anale
Amhi aparadhi lokansi asaca vyavahara karato
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryankarita vinasa ahe
Kaya amhi tumhala tuccha panya (virya) pasuna nirmana kele nahi
Maga amhi tyasa majabuta (ani suraksita) sthani thevale
Eka nirdharita vele paryarnta
Maga amhi anumana lavale, tara amhi kiti cangale anumana lavanare ahota
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi vinasa ahe
Kaya amhi jaminila sancayita karanari nahi banavile
Jivanta asalelyannahi ani melelyannahi
Ani amhi ticyata unca (ani vajanadara) parvata banavile, ani tumhala sincita karanare goda pani pajale
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi vinasa ahe
Tya (jahannama) kade ja, jila tumhi khote tharavita hote
Cala tya savalikade, jila tina sakha aheta
Ji vastavika na chaya denari ahe ani na jvalapasuna vacavu sakate
Nihsansaya, (jahannama) mahalasarakhya cingarya phekate
Janu kahi te pivale unta aheta
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi durdasa (vinasa) ahe
Aja (ca divasa) asa divasa ahe ki te boluhi sakanara nahita
Na tyanna sababa mandanyaci anumati dili ja'ila
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryanci duhsthiti (kharabi) ahe
Ha ahe phaisalyaca divasa. Amhi tumhala ani purvi ho'una gelelya lokanna (sarvanna) ekatrita kele ahe
Tevha jara tumhi majhyasi ekhadi cala khelu sakata asala tara kheluna paha
Duhkha ahe tya divasi khote tharavinaryankarita
Nihsansaya, neka sadacari loka savalita asatila ani vahatya jharyammadhye
Ani tya phalammadhye, jyanci te iccha karatila
(He jannatamadhye rahanaryanno!) Majeta kha ani pya, apalya krta-karmancya mobadalyata
Nihsansaya, amhi satkarma (neki) karanaryanna asaca prakare mobadala pradana karato
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryankarita mothe duhkha ahe
(He khote tharavinaryanno!) Tumhi (ya jagata) thode kha'una pi'una ghya ani labha prapta karuna ghya. Niscitaca tumhi aparadhi ahata
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryansathi vinasa ahe
Tyanna jevha sangitale jate ki ruku'a kara (jhuka) tara karita nahi
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryanca vinasa ahe
Ata ya (kura'ana) nantara konatya gostivara imana rakhatila
